block.p: Kathryn Lynn Hunt, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Edward T. Hunt Jr. of Orchard Park, N.Y., was married yesterday to Gerritt Thomas Graham, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas M. Graham Jr. of Southport, Conn. The Rev. John B. Smiley, a Presbyterian minister, performed the ceremony at Westminster Presbyterian Church in Buffalo.

Mrs. Graham, 25, graduated cum laude from Bucknell University and is an administrative assistant at the Mount Tamalpais School in Mill Valley, Calif. Her father, who is retired, was a vice president and the western regional manager in Buffalo for Nynex.

Kathryn Lynn Hunt, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Edward T. Hunt Jr. of Orchard Park, N.Y., was married yesterday to Gerritt Thomas Graham, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas M. Graham Jr. of Southport, Conn. The Rev. John B. Smiley, a Presbyterian minister, performed the ceremony at Westminster Presbyterian Church in Buffalo.

Mrs. Graham, 25, graduated cum laude from Bucknell University and is an administrative assistant at the Mount Tamalpais School in Mill Valley, Calif. Her father, who is retired, was a vice president and the western regional manager in Buffalo for Nynex.

Mr. Graham, 29, is an account manager for the Oracle Corporation, the computer software company in Redwood Shores, Calif. He graduated from Georgetown University. His father is the president of Thomas M. Graham & Company, a real estate investment company in New York.
